___location.description: The location of the resource. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

___name.description: The name of the container registry.

$eref.description: The properties of a container registry.

___storageAccount.description: The properties of the storage account for the container registry. If specified, the storage account must be in the same physical location as the container registry.

___adminUserEnabled.description: The value that indicates whether the admin user is enabled. This value is false by default.

___properties.description: The properties of the container registry.

_88StorageAccountProperties.description: The properties of a storage account for a container registry.

___name.description: The name of the storage account.

___accessKey.description: The access key to the storage account.

_88RegistryProperties.description: The properties of a container registry.

$eref.description: The properties of a storage account for a container registry.

___name.description: The name of the storage account.

___accessKey.description: The access key to the storage account.

___storageAccount.description: The properties of the storage account for the container registry. If specified, the storage account must be in the same physical location as the container registry.

___adminUserEnabled.description: The value that indicates whether the admin user is enabled. This value is false by default.
